data.title: Add Relationship
data.text: Son of Hong Kong billionaire Li Ka-shing is chairman of Hong Kong's biggest phone company. His Pacific Century Group paid $500 million for AIG's asset management business, Pinebridge, in March 2010; father's foundation later moved small sum to firm. Split with his girlfriend Isabella Leong, who starred in The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor. The pair have three sons, including twins born last year.
